title: Jacek Berensztajn
text:
Jacek Berensztajn (born 16 October 1973 in <a href="Piotrk%C3%B3w%20Trybunalski">Piotrków Trybunalski</a>) is a retired Polish professional <a href="association%20football">footballer</a> who played for <a href="GKS%20Be%C5%82chat%C3%B3w">GKS Bełchatów</a>, <a href="Odra%20Wodzis%C5%82aw%20%C5%9Al%C4%85ski">Odra Wodzisław Śląski</a> and <a href="Zag%C5%82%C4%99bie%20Sosnowiec">Zagłębie Sosnowiec</a> in the Polish <a href="Ekstraklasa">Ekstraklasa</a>.
Berensztajn made two appearances for the <a href="Poland%20national%20football%20team">Poland national football team</a>.
